name: EMF Reader
description: Detects electromagnetic field disturbances caused by ghost activity. Readings range from 1-5, with Level 5 being evidence.
usage: Carry and watch for readings near ghost activity. Level 5 reading confirms EMF 5 evidence. Higher tier models have faster response times.

name: Spirit Box
description: A modified radio that allows ghosts to communicate through white noise. Works in the ghost's room.
usage: Ask questions in the ghost room (e.g., 'Where are you?', 'How old are you?'). Some ghosts only respond when the player is alone.

name: Ghost Writing Book
description: A journal that ghosts can write cryptic messages in. Must be placed in the ghost's room.
usage: Place in the ghost room on the floor or a surface. Check back periodically for writing. Higher tiers work faster.

name: Thermometer
description: Measures room temperature. Freezing temperatures (below 0째C/32째F) are evidence of certain ghost types.
usage: Scan rooms to find cold spots. The ghost room is typically 5-10째C colder. Readings below 0째C confirm Freezing Temps evidence.

name: UV Light
description: Reveals ghost fingerprints left on doors, windows, and light switches under ultraviolet light.
usage: Shine on doors, light switches, windows, and keyboards. Look for glowing handprints or fingerprints.

name: Video Camera
description: Records footage and detects Ghost Orbs through night vision. Now also captures video evidence for the Journal.
usage: Set up on a tripod in ghost room. Check the truck monitor for Ghost Orbs. Use night vision mode. Record unique video evidence.

name: D.O.T.S Projector
description: Projects a grid of green laser dots that reveals ghost silhouettes passing through them.
usage: Place in ghost room on floor or wall. Watch for ghost silhouettes moving through the dots. Some ghosts only show on camera.

name: Flashlight
description: Basic handheld light source for navigating dark locations. Essential equipment for all investigations.
usage: Always carry one. Ghosts may turn it off during ghost events. Click to toggle on/off.

name: Sound Recorder
description: New equipment from the Chronicle update. Records paranormal sounds that can be played back in the Journal.
usage: Hold near ghost activity to record sounds like whispers, groans, and laughter. Captured sounds appear in your Journal.

name: Photo Camera
description: Takes photos of ghost activity for documentation and rewards. Capture unique photos for bonus money and XP.
usage: Photograph ghosts, interactions, bones, cursed objects, fingerprints, and more. Up to 5 unique photos per investigation.

name: Crucifix
description: Prevents ghosts from initiating a hunt within a 3-meter radius (5m for Demons/Banshees). Has 2 uses.
usage: Place in ghost room BEFORE a hunt starts. Each crucifix has 2 charges. Will burn when successfully preventing a hunt.

name: Incense
description: Formerly called Smudge Sticks. Burning incense repels the ghost and can stop an active hunt temporarily.
usage: Light with a firelight near the ghost. During hunt: blinds ghost for 6 seconds. Outside hunt: prevents hunting for 90 seconds (180 for Spirit).

name: Firelight
description: Used to light Incense and Candles. Essential for protection strategies. Formerly known as Lighter.
usage: Required to light Incense during hunts. Keep in inventory for emergency use.

name: Salt
description: When ghosts walk through salt piles, they leave UV-visible footprints. Wraiths never leave salt footprints.
usage: Place salt piles in doorways or hallways. Use UV light to reveal footprints. Great for tracking ghost movement.

name: Motion Sensor
description: Detects movement in a small area and displays on the truck monitor. Also counts as video evidence when triggered.
usage: Place in hallways or rooms to track ghost movement. Check truck monitor for activity alerts.

name: Sound Sensor
description: Monitors sound levels in a designated area. Higher readings indicate ghost activity nearby.
usage: Place around the map covering different areas. Check truck monitor for sound level readings.

name: Parabolic Microphone
description: Long-range directional microphone that detects sounds through walls. Useful for locating the ghost room.
usage: Point in different directions and listen for high readings. Banshees produce a unique shriek (scream icon appears).

name: Sanity Medication
description: Pills that restore 40% of your sanity when consumed. Essential for extended investigations.
usage: Use when sanity is low to prevent early hunts. Also removes the Moroi's sanity drain curse.

name: Head Gear
description: Wearable head equipment with multiple tiers: Head Camera (Tier 1), LED Headlamp (Tier 2), Night Vision Goggles (Tier 3).
usage: Tier 1: Streams view to truck. Tier 2: Hands-free lighting. Tier 3: See in complete darkness.

name: Candle
description: Provides ambient light and slowly restores sanity while lit. Can be blown out by ghost activity.
usage: Light with firelight and place or carry. Helps restore sanity. Onryos won't hunt near lit candles.

name: Tripod
description: Mounting equipment for video cameras. Provides stable positioning for hands-free monitoring.
usage: Place in ghost room. Mount video camera on top for stable recording. Great for Ghost Orb hunting.
